citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:45-1:15pm on
25-MAY-2022. Upon arrival called phone number on file, no answer, LM. Knocked on door, no answer. Waited 30
minutes. Left flyer and business card in door. Called again after 30 minutes, no answer. Left site.
End Section

narrative:

Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.

minutes. Left flyer and business card in door. Called again after 30 minutes, no answer. Left site.
